formattedAddress: RU#115A, 20 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: RU#115A, 20 Hudson Yards, New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of purchasing my long-awaited dream watch at Watches of Switzerland Hudson Yards, and I cannot express enough how Stephanie transformed this experience into a truly magical journey! From the moment I set foot in the store to the joyous day of picking up my watch, Stephanie's exceptional service and personal touches made it an unforgettable experience.

The anticipation of getting my dream watch was already high, but Stephanie went above and beyond to surprise me with a pickup near Christmas time, adding a touch of festivity to the entire process. This thoughtful timing made the entire experience even more special, creating a connection between my dream timepiece and the magic of Christmas in New York City.

What truly set Stephanie apart was her dedication to making this moment uniquely mine. She and her team took the time to craft a personalized "The Nice List Certificate" with my name on it, acknowledging my patience and kindness throughout the process. This unexpected gesture not only showcased Stephanie's attention to detail but also made me feel truly valued as a customer.

For those seeking more than just a watch – an experience that seamlessly blends expertise, dedication, and personalized care – Watches of Switzerland is the place to go!

I eagerly look forward to growing my watch collection with Watches of Switzerland, confident that Stephanie's outstanding service will consistently transform each acquisition into a unique and treasured experience.

originalText.text:
Yesterday was my second time purchasing a watch from Watches of Switzerland, and I can’t express how fantastic my experience has been both times.

Before becoming a client at Watches of Switzerland, I had visited various other watch dealers over the years. I must say that nowhere else have I found the level of knowledge, warmth, and consideration that I've experienced from Stephanie Recto and the rest of the Watches of Switzerland team.

Stephanie's personal touch is truly unmatched. When I visit the store, she remembers every detail of our past conversations: what watches I own, what I have been interested in — honestly even better than I do.

Stephanie knew the latest watch I was purchasing was very special to me. As I eagerly arrived to pick up my new watch, I was pleasantly surprised to find she had taken time from her busy day to decorate the area with little clouds, and left a heartfelt personal note hoping that I was on “cloud 9”. It's these small but meaningful gestures that truly set Stephanie apart and make each experience at Watches of Switzerland unforgettable.

I look forward to working with Stephanie and WOS to build out my collection for years to come!

originalText.text: I had a tremendous experience in Watches of Sutherland in Hudson Yards. I spoke with a representative named Alan who's very insightful and knowledgeable. He was able to navigate me through the store very well and also provide very valuable information that I needed in order to make an informed decision about my watch. I appreciate their courtesy and consideration. They treated me very well and I think they provide excellent customer service. They were very honest and straightforward with me. They made me feel comfortable.  I would definitely come back to this store for all my future watch purchases.

originalText.text:
I purchased a beautiful Grand Seiko watch to gift my husband for Christmas present. The service was very impeccable! Alan was very helpful from the start to end of this wonderful experience and even introduced the new collection. Highly recommend purchasing Grand Seiko watches from this location!

**My husband and I went back to Watches of Switzerland last week for his dream watch, and Alan was really helpful once again. He greeted both of us professionally and took his time to go through the entire process. Definitely will go back to Watches of Switzerland for the amazing service and personalized care.

originalText.text: My wife and I have been looking for a wedding watch for a while, and decided to stop by Watches of Switzerland during our trip to New York. I have to admit working with any luxury store was never easy, but Alan really made us feel comfortable. He is very gentle, understanding and knowledgeable as he showed us a few watches that I have in mind. The whole process was smooth as it should be. Although the watch we were looking for wasnt available, we will definitely come by the store again when it is back in stock
